"A.P.241/4/2": "Onto Earthlings distinct ability, the creation of embodied weapons. I have a good idea of how it works."
"If we were to compare with ARKS, it is Earth's version of the Summoner ability."
"Hitsugi, can you manifest your embodied sword for me?"
"Umm, okay. \"Ame no Habakiri\"."
"Is this alright?"
"Yes, thank you very much."
"Just now, under Hitsugi's commands, the photons in the atmosphere accumulated and took form."
"As one of ARKS' abilities, we do embody photons, but it appears to be a bit different from how Earthlings do."
"Something far greater than that... You embodied an image simply from thin air. It's something only someone can do if they're accustomed to ether."
"Since imagery is directly linked to embodiment, it's likely to be more efficient as well."
"It's flaws come from the lack of general usage, and the small number of people able to use it."
"By the way, what was the name of your embodied weapon, Hitsugi? Ame no Hakiri? No, that's a bit off..."
"Close. It's \"Ame no Habakiri\"."
"Does it have an origin where it derived from?"
"Yeah, umm..."
"Oh! I know! It's the weapon that appears in the Japanese Mythology, Izumo's Legend! The sword that sliced apart Yamata no Orochi!"
"Eh? Aru, how did you know?"
"While I was sitting in your room, I read about it. There are a lot of books on legends! Tons of them!"
"1. You like books?"
"2. You like legends?"
"I guess so. Particularly, I like flipping the pages of books. I don't know how to put it, but it calms me down."
"Although I've read a lot of books, I definitely prefer legends and heroic fables."
"I like legends too, but I prefer heroic fables in particular."
"Even if something happens in life, just by reading books and thinking about the heroes.. it makes me feel calmer."
"Hmm, now you're thinking that I'm childish, right? I don't care, my heart and body will always be a child, after all. Hmph!"
